channel.title: Projects on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Academic

item.title: Compiler for Decaf Programming Language
item.description:
Developed a compiler front-end for Decaf(a subset of C++) to LLVM IR.

Wrote the lexical and syntax analyzer (parser), Abstract Syntax Tree generator for the parsed program.

Implemented the LLVM IR generator to obtain LLVM IR for the source program.

item.title: Wikipedia Seach Engine
item.description:
Designed and developed an efficient search engine to query archived Wikipedia documents sized 46GB, using secondary indexing and external merge-sort.

Developed and tested TF/IDF-based heuristics to rank relevant wiki pages. Achieved mean response time of 2 seconds.
